channel.title: What do I need?
channel.description: Ok I am on a crusade to make the best server posibly with the runescape private server as a base then shy away into my own domain to do this and not hit a lawsuit I cant have the same graphics as the actual runescape, I need to know what the best graphics program is to make new items,How to use the graphics/add them into the game,Change basic names<Ive edited it in the class8.java file,Item.cfg files and items.java files not sure if thats right>Im mainly looking for something so I can work on new armors and weapons and then i need a tutorial or help of some sort on how to add them into the game as the desired item.....any help would be appreciated.

item.title: What do I need?
item.dc:creator: @Verac Verac
item.description:
@Verac wrote:

thnx Nah i just have big plans or dreams and want to do something great i think its awesome to set the stage of your own adventure and then play it out be able to control what happens to a degree. Thanks for help but i doubt paint will be much help to me…

Read full topic

item.title: What do I need?
item.dc:creator: @jj_boss jj boss
item.description:
@jj_boss wrote:

… wow, how unhelpful, paint. thinking a bit high for yourself eh? Verac, i suggest you read the tutorials section maybe? might help a lil…

Read full topic

item.title: What do I need?
